reviewText: Very informative story telling about an amazing physical feat. How any of them lived is beyond me.

I purchased 3 different DVDs for my wife after she read "Undaunted Courage"  an account of the Lewis and Clark expedition and the after story of their lives.  Of the three, I rank the PBS DVD "The Journey of the Corps of Discovery" the most captivating.  It was twice as long, two DVDs, and therefore more thorough with a great cast for the voices of the persons involved.  If that is too much time to devote to this, and you want a quicker one hour program about it, I think I'd favor the National Geographic one disc "Great Journey West", but that is more of a toss up between this DVD and that one..

Lewis and Clark:  Explorers of the New Frontier is one of many documentaries from the Biography series produced by the A and E Network.  This concise video does a good job of condensing the events and people involved with the Louisiana Purchase and the Lewis and Clark Expedition in less than fifty minutes.  The narrative is supplemented with contemporary paintings as well as images of scenic landscapes encountered by the expedition.  We learn about the challenges of the journey up the Missouri River, across the Rockies, and on to the Pacific Ocean.  Contacts with Native Americans are also portrayed.  While suitable for middle and high school classrooms, the video discusses sexual relations between Native American women and members of the Corps of Discovery.  Thus, parents/teachers may want to give children/students advance notice before viewing.  Still, I use this video with my eighth grade American history students during my unit on the Louisiana Purchase and have found it to be an effective teaching tool.

The video mentions how all the Native American women felt it was good luck to have sex with York because of the color of his skin.  I think it is about 19 minutes.  I have a viewing guide for this video posted on teacherspayteachers website for those who need it.
Great product! Really enjoyed sharing it with my class! This DVD came on time and in great condition! Thank you!
